Package index

Core Functions

Create surreal datasets with hidden images in residuals

surreal()
Find X Matrix and Y Vector for Residual Surrealism
surreal_text()
Apply the surreal method to a text string
surreal_image()
Apply the surreal method to an image file
border_augmentation()
Transform Data by Adding a Border

Interactive App

Explore the surreal algorithm interactively

surreal_app()
Launch the Surreal Shiny App
